content.raw:
looks like the loading the skin mesh also loads the animation: 

[#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/180e87c97955a8c1a2cfdf4872ce65c704a79e69/src/rendering/SceneManager.cc#lines-527](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/180e87c97955a8c1a2cfdf4872ce65c704a79e69/src/rendering/SceneManager.cc#lines-527)

We would need to explicitly remove the animation if we don’t want it to be in the mesh object. 

From the ign-rendering perspective, it does not know about this common case of actors though, it just loads whatever is contained in `common::Mesh`
